name: Name That Cartoon
description:
Name That Cartoon

Name that cartoon is the ultimate cartoon quiz with old and new cartoons included.
Just name the cartoon from the picture.

Features:

-442 levels to play.
-Old and new cartoons included.
-Free to download.
-Earn coins for correct answers.
-Share with your friends to earn coins.
-Coins can be used to help solve hard levels.

If you like this cartoon quiz game please leave a review.

Thanks for playing.
